posts.post_content:
Gents,

Looking to finish up a duplicate T206 rare back set.  Need the following please.  Lower condition commons are preferred.

AB 350 no frame
AB 460
Cycle 460
Carolina Brights
Sweet Cap 350-460 Fact 25
Piedmont 42
Broadleaf 350
Broadleaf 460 (probably won't get)
Blank (probably won't get)
Drum
Uzit
Lenox Black
Lenox Brown (probably won't get)

I'd be happy to trade or pay cash.  I have rare backs or minor print errors as trade bait.

Best,
Scott
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
